desc.p: The Customer number associated with this account record will be stored here for denoting the Tax amount for the customer for an account with joint holders.
Multi-valued with the Joint Holder customer number in the Account record.
The Tax amount in the Local currency for the customer for this transaction account record is displayed here. Will be displayed for accounts with joint holders.
Standard amount format for the Local Currency of the database.
Multi-valued with joint holder customer Tax amount for the account record.

There will be one record in this file for each Tax entry Account wise, where joint holders exist for the account record and Tax is required to be computed customer Tax status wise and called through a local routine TAX.LOCAL.RTN in Tax application.
Will be generated only if routine TAX.LOCAL.RTN is called through field CALC.ROUTINE in Tax application.
The format will be Deal Id "-" Date, where the Deal Id is the Account Number and the Date is the Value date.
